title: Process Still Loading For 76ers, Mavs-Suns Game 7
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss the Heat eliminating the 76ers, if Harden will give Philly a discount and how long ‘The Process’ can continue. Plus, can the Mavs take down the Suns in Game 7, which player will make a statement in the decisive game and if Boston can avoid elimination.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Does The Future Look Like In Philly, Big Mavs-Suns Game 7
